mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (userNo, userId, userName, password, phoneNumber, email, roleId, isAdmin, vacationCount) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{roleId}, #{isAdmin, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{vacationCount})
